title: Bangor PD's Facebook Page Isn't Typical Police Blotter Fodder
teaser: The police department in Bangor, Maine, has had a surprise hit with its Facebook page. In a city of 33,000, the page has earned almost 20,000 followers.
contentencoded:
The police department in Bangor, Maine, has had a surprise hit with its Facebook page. In a city of 33,000, the page has earned almost 20,000 followers.
